title: Textarea
description: Displays a form textarea or a component that looks like a textarea.

body.raw: ## textarea Displays a form textarea field or a component that looks like an textarea field. ### Installation CLI Manual ```bash npx shadcn@latest add "https://designali.in/r/textarea" ``` Copy and paste the following code into your project. Update the import paths to match your project setup. ### Props | Prop | Type | Description | Default | | ---- | ---- | ----------- | ------- |
